attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Force the Prime Minister to call a general election if Labour lose the crewe and Nantwich by election. Gordon Brown was not elected by the general population to be the prime minister and the only way he will be accepted is if he is given a mandate by the public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
